required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: High Agreement Between the Danish Ventral Hernia Database and Hospital Files in Region Zealand
clinical_study.official_title: High Agreement Between the Danish Ventral Hernia Database and Hospital Files in Region Zealand

brief_summary.textblock: Is there agreement between data in the Danish Ventral Hernia Database and patient files

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective

primary_outcome.description: Compare information registered in The Danish Ventral Hernia Database with information obtained from patient files

clinical_study.condition: Data Agreement Between a Database and Hospital Files After a Ventral Hernia Repair

arm_group.arm_group_label: patients with a ventral hernia repair
arm_group.description: All patients with a ventral hernia repair performed in Region Zealand and registered in The Danish Ventral Hernia Database during October 1st 2010 to October 1st 2011

intervention.arm_group_label: patients with a ventral hernia repair

study_pop.textblock: Hernia repairs performed in Region Zealand and registered in the Danish Ventral Hernia Database during the study period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All ventral hernia repairs

overall_official.affiliation: Dept. Surgery, Køge Hospital, University of Copenhagen
